meanings.definition: Not exempt from a rule or regulation.
meanings.sent1: The nonexempts employees must follow the safety guidelines.
meanings.sent2: It is important for all nonexempts individuals to adhere to the company policies.
meanings.sent3: The nonexempts students were reminded to turn in their assignments on time.
meanings.sent4: The nonexempts members of the team carried out the task diligently.
meanings.sent5: The nonexempts group had to complete the training before starting their work.

meanings.definition: Employees who are not exempt from overtime pay regulations.
meanings.sent1: The nonexempts were happy to receive their overtime pay for the extra hours worked.
meanings.sent2: All nonexempts are entitled to fair compensation for their additional time at work.
meanings.sent3: The nonexempts organized a potluck to celebrate their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent4: The nonexempts gathered to discuss the upcoming changes in the overtime policy.
meanings.sent5: The nonexempts team completed the project on time and within budget.
